ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: fix bug in parsing strand from new gff format.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fix zmap to write new extended format blixem files.
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_09_11.shtml: new zmap release notes for 11 September 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_09_11.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 11/09/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.17434/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • doc/Project_notes/Goals.shtml: first version of goals for gemma
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: add function to return a list of features within a given range.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindowMenubar.c: add new seqtools queue for blixem et al. tickets.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add code to support load_features command.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: fix up predefined dna colours.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: fix bug in mag test that stopped cols being displayed.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItem.c: fix up dna highlight to call func. highlight features as well as regions, fix bug in get feature call.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix off by one bug in dna sequence positioning.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem.c: fix a bug in colour assignment and make the 'draw' colour the text colour.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c: minor change to mag func.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: Move functions from zmapWindowItemText.c for exon highlighting. Fix non-monospace font bug.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextFeature.c: fix non-monotype font bug, fix text so 'draw' colour is text colour, remove attempt to guess highlight colour.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem.c: fix select_colour so it's set properly.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem_I.h: add flag for select_colour and being_destroyed flag.
  • src/zmapControl/zmapControlWindowMenubar.c: botched last change, correct now.
  • src/: zmapControl/remote/xremote_gui_test.c, zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote.c, zmapControl/remote/zmapXRemote_P.h, zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: turn debugging messages off.
  • src/: zmapUtils/zmapXRemoteUtils.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c, zmapView/zmapView.c: turn debugging messages off.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c: hacked fix to double free bug, items freed here and also in windowtextitem (probably).
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix off by one area in text size calc.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem.c: format changes only.
  • doc/Project_notes/Goals.shtml: add comments on how to restructure blixem.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemText.c: fix bug, code looking for completely the wrong style for translation.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowSequenceFeature.c: fix bug whereby feature highlighting did not work.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowTextItem.c: fix some of highlight bugs, still lost on high zoom level.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • wmake/makefile: move clean target so it does not depend on my version file, otherwise it removes it prematurely.
  • w9/blxparser.c: remove duplicate definition of blxSeq2MSP, now in translate.c.
  • w9/blxview.c: Added statistics dialog
  • w9/blxparser.c: fix parsing for seqbl_x files, stupid strtok errors.
